item.title: 在米奇-麦康奈尔宣布他将卸任参议院共和党领袖后，白宫发表了总统拜登的声明："在他多年的领导期间，我们总是能坦诚地相互交流，并将国家置于自己之上。
item.description:
After Mitch McConnell announced he'll step down as Senate Republican leader, the White House issued a statement from Pres. Biden: "During his many years of leadership, we could always speak with each other honestly and put the country ahead of ourselves." https://t.co/9biAz6AIP8 pic.twitter.com/JWmctitfiT

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 警方调查阿拉巴马州检察长办公室遗留爆炸物时公布了相关人员图像。
item.description:
Person of interest images released as police investigate explosive left at Alabama attorney general's office. https://t.co/kxUsIE42ME

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最高法院周三似乎对维持特朗普时代的撞枪托禁令持开放态度，因为这种装置可以将武器变成快速发射的非法 "机关枪"。但尚不清楚多数法官是否会最终支持这一裁决。
item.description:
The Supreme Court on Wednesday appeared open to upholding a Trump-era ban on bump stocks as devices that turn weapons into rapid-fire illegal "machine guns." But it wasn't clear whether a majority of justices would ultimately back such a ruling. https://t.co/4UhijUOiyU

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 希尔斯伯勒县警察局航空队使用热成像仪搜索了数千英里的沼泽和森林，最终在雷达上发现了这个女孩。
item.description:
Officials had conducted a desperate search in the air and on the ground, with the Hillsborough County Sheriff's Department aviation unit using a thermal imaging camera to scour thousands of miles of swamps and forest before spotting the girl on their radar. pic.twitter.com/zEVlp0EkBg

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 请看：周一，当副警长营救一名从坦帕市的家中逃入一片林地和沼泽地的患有自闭症的 5 岁女孩时，车载摄像头拍摄到了她英勇的瞬间。
item.description:
SEE IT: Body camera footage showed the heroic moments when deputies rescued a 5-year-old girl with autism who had wandered away from her Tampa home into a wooded, swampy area on Monday.https://t.co/DxXclN3ooC pic.twitter.com/SRAB06fliV

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 更多信息
item.description:

item.title: 新一代运动员有越来越多的有色人种作为榜样，比如 X Games 金牌得主 Zeb Powell。
item.description:
This new generation of athletes has a slowly growing number of role models of color to see themselves in, like X Games gold medalist Zeb Powell. pic.twitter.com/58uYgv9Z3T

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 对于有色人种运动员来说，户外运动的世界是难以进入的。接受一项新的运动需要跨越一个又一个障碍。不过，尽管挑战重重，一项研究发现，冬季运动的参与正慢慢变得更加多样化。
item.description:
The world of outdoor recreation is deceptively inaccessible for athletes of color.

Embracing a new sport requires navigating barrier after barrier. But despite the challenges, a study found that winter sports participation is slowly getting more diverse. pic.twitter.com/CToUI6oHy8

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 联合国人道主义事务协调办公室主任拉梅什-拉贾辛汉姆（Ramesh Rajasingham）说，加沙北部每六名两岁以下儿童中就有一名严重营养不良。
item.description:
One in six children under the age of 2 in northern Gaza is suffering from acute malnutrition, says Ramesh Rajasingham, director of the U.N. Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs. https://t.co/VhVP4nIUne

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 一名伦敦法官裁定，英国政府有权在哈里王子访问英国期间剥夺其自动安全警卫的权利。
item.description:
A London judge has ruled that the U.K. government had the right to strip Prince Harry of an automatic security detail during visits to Britain. https://t.co/2XdSVbLOcq pic.twitter.com/fMNhdBJRZF

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新消息众议院和参议院领导人已达成一项两党协议，在周五迫近的最后期限之前避免政府部分关门。参议院将很快进行投票。
item.description:
JUST IN: House and Senate leaders have reached a bipartisan deal to avert a partial government shutdown ahead of Friday's looming deadline.

The House is expected to vote Thursday on a temporary funding bill. The Senate will vote soon after. https://t.co/mqLUTykg19

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：最高法院已同意审理唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关于他在联邦选举颠覆案中免于起诉的案件。
item.description:

item.title: 本周二，拜登总统在密歇根州的民主党初选中以 81% 的选票获胜。但该州至少有 10 万民主党人投了 "未承诺 "票，这在很大程度上是对拜登处理以色列-哈马斯战争的方式不满而投出的抗议票。
item.description:
On Tuesday, Pres. Biden won the Democratic primary in Michigan with 81% of the vote.

But at least 100,000 Democrats in the state voted for “uncommitted,” a protest vote driven in large part by dissatisfaction with Biden’s handling of the Israel-Hamas war. https://t.co/zgS3KCJdHY

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 随着参议院共和党头号人物米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）宣布计划在 11 月放弃领导职务，关于谁可能接替他的位置的猜测不绝于耳。
item.description:
With top Senate Republican Mitch McConnell announcing his plans to relinquish his leadership role in November, speculation is swirling about who might fill his shoes. https://t.co/Gx4eNgSXB6

item.title: 拉里-戴维就喜剧演员理查德-刘易斯的去世发表声明："他是最有趣的人，也是最可爱的人，这一点非常罕见。但今天他让我泣不成声 我永远不会原谅他"
item.description:
Larry David issues statement on the death of comedian Richard Lewis: "He had that rare combination of being the funniest person and also the sweetest. But today he made me sob and for that I’ll never forgive him.” https://t.co/BF741nJnt6 pic.twitter.com/R2xgpY87OH

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：纽约上诉法院驳回了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关于推迟4.64亿美元欺诈案判决的请求，这一裁决意味着，就目前而言，这位前总统必须在未来几周内缴纳数亿美元的保证金。
item.description:
BREAKING: A New York appeals court denied Donald Trump's request to delay a $464 million fraud judgment, a ruling that means, for now, that the former president is required to post a bond for hundreds of millions of dollars in the coming weeks.https://t.co/zx51kaCqza pic.twitter.com/7wZggK2Uu9

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 爱达荷州服刑时间最长的死囚托马斯-尤金-克里奇（Thomas Eugene Creech）被指派执行注射死刑的医疗小组未能建立静脉注射管路，因此周三停止执行死刑。
item.description:
The execution of serial killer Thomas Eugene Creech, Idaho's longest-serving death row inmate, was halted on Wednesday after the medical team assigned to administer a lethal injection failed to establish an IV line, officials said. https://t.co/ZJdUj0w5tu

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 加里-西尼斯（Gary Sinise）正在纪念他已故的儿子麦坎娜-安东尼-"麦克"-西尼斯（McCanna Anthony "Mac" Sinise），他于 1 月 5 日死于一种名为脊索瘤的罕见癌症。享年 33 岁。
item.description:
Gary Sinise is honoring his late son McCanna Anthony "Mac" Sinise, who died Jan. 5 from a rare form of cancer called chordoma. He was 33.https://t.co/lQVAjAcDyk pic.twitter.com/8VuIXqskM3

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 多场大火正在影响德克萨斯州潘汉德尔地区，其中一场大火已迅速发展成为该州历史上第二大野火。
item.description:
Multiple fires are impacting the Texas Panhandle, including what has quickly grown to become the second-largest wildfire in state history. https://t.co/0MXE6bmh9q

item.title: 当 @SelinaWangTV 问及拜登总统是否在年度体检中进行了认知测试时，白宫新闻秘书卡琳-让-皮埃尔（Karine Jean-Pierre）说："他的医生，包括神经科医生，都认为他不需要测试。卡琳-让-皮埃尔（Karine Jean-Pierre）说："他的医生，包括神经科医生，都认为他不需要。""这是他们的评估。"
item.description:
When asked by @SelinaWangTV if Pres. Biden took a cognitive test as part of his annual physical, White House press sec. Karine Jean-Pierre says, "His doctor, including the neurologist, do not believe that he needs one."

"That is their assessment." https://t.co/Fpiz54Fcnx pic.twitter.com/sIM280dXlu

— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) February 28, 2024

item.title: 检察官指控一家虚假的安全学校向数千名纽约市建筑工人颁发假证书。
item.description:
Prosecutors allege a sham safety school gave bogus certifications to thousands of New York City construction workers.

The company and six of its executives are facing charges. https://t.co/2rMcPIq0uK pic.twitter.com/sIntjiyOrO

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 温迪快餐连锁店（Wendy's）在宣布投资菜单板后，对有关该连锁店将提高价格的报道进行了反击。
item.description:
Wendy's is pushing back on reports that the fast-food chain will be increasing prices after announcing it would invest in menu boards that could have the ability to introduce dynamic or surge pricing. https://t.co/irUFQ7a5UX pic.twitter.com/5mNxicubun

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 下个月的同一个周末将举行汽车行业最盛大的两场活动，但事实上，汽车发烧友可能不得不在这两场活动中做出选择，这让汽车发烧友群体产生了分歧。
item.description:
Two of the auto industry's flashiest events are taking place next month on the same weekend — but the fact that gearheads may be forced to choose between them has divided the enthusiast community. https://t.co/lwhhOW6WQP

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024
